doc.name: ArrayToMatrix
doc.description: Convert an array to a row or column vector encoded as a matrix token. The input array has to have a type that is convertible to a matrix.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: If true, then convert the array to a matrix with one row and multiple columns (a row vector), and otherwise, convert the input to a matrix with one column and multiple rows (a column vector). This is a boolean that defaults to true.
